content: Let's test whether admin can login to the chat app. Always ask for data you don't know like URL, credentilas, etc. If you don't know what to do next, ask user.
Alright, let's start by navigating to the chat app. Could you please provide me with the URL of the chat app?

name: navigate_browser
content: Navigating to https://dev.app.serenityapp.com/sign-in returned status code 200

name: fill_element
content: Text input on the element by text, input[name='email'] ,was successfully performed

name: fill_element
content: Text input on the element by text, input[name='password'] ,was successfully performed
We have successfully filled in the email and password fields. Now, let's click on the "Sign In" button to log in.
We have successfully logged in. Now, let's proceed with the test scenario. What specific actions or functionalities would you like to test in the chat app?
Based on the current state of the browser, the "Admin" section is visible.
